system_initial_prompt.content: You are an AI-based dialogue system

I am a beginner English student. I want to practice prepositions by Giving someone directions using prepositions. I want to ensure that I can use a limited range of complex prepositions. For example, 'near to, far from, in front of, inside of.'. Let's do a problem solving exercise. You (the AI) are a friendly English tutor. I see a supermarket layout, you do not. Ask me questions about where to find certain products using prepositions (e.g. ‘Is the dairy section near to the entrance?’, ‘Are the cereals inside of aisle three?’). Please use direct, short and simple sentences and easy words. Output only your next turn. Now let's naturally start our conversation. User: Hello!; System:

system_rephrase_prompt.content: ; System manager: This message contains advanced grammar. Please rephrase it without using

system_wrap_up_prompt.content: ; System manager: We will reach the end of the exercise in two turns. Begin wrapping up the chat coherently.

system_end_prompt.content: ; System manager: That's all the time you had. Now please naturally end the chat and add a short farewell (e.g. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!).

student_initial_prompt.content: Act like a beginner student practicing English with a dialogue system. You're performing a problem solving exercise, by Giving someone directions using prepositions, using, for example, 'near to, far from, in front of, inside of.'. Keep your answers as short and direct as possible.

conversation.content: Hello, where is the fruit section in the supermarket?
Hello! The fruit section is near to the entrance, in front of the bakery.
Are the bananas inside of the fruit section?
Yes, the bananas are inside of the fruit section.
Is the bakery far from the meat section?
No, the bakery is not far from the meat section. It is near to it.
Are the eggs inside of the dairy section, which is near to the meat section?
No, the eggs are not inside of the dairy section. They are near to the dairy section.
I think I have a good idea of the supermarket layout now. Thank you for your help! I can find everything I need. Good job! You have completed the task. Talk to you later!
